Summary: Brite red sphere with white light.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Southgate
There were no other sightings in Southgate on or around September 12th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsme and my brother were outside talking, i looked around and noticed a brite red sphere with a white light in the front of the red sphere the red sphere was huge, and brite as a tower making light steady brite red no flashing at all the white light was dimming from brite white to a dimming white. the object was steady moving across the sky it was maybe a half a mile away about 200 to 300 feet above the ground it stopped dead steady in the sky for about 15 seconds then changed direction and did not go up or down it moved away in a straight line and it faded away into the sky.
